dashboard.footer: This page is not endorsed by or affiliated with FACEIT. All data on this page is fetched directly from FACEIT and Steam, we do not keep any records.

account_finder.faceit_not_found: No FACEIT Account belonging to the specified Steam Account could be found.
account_finder.steam_not_found: Steam Account could not be found.

stats.user_not_found: User could not be found. Please check you input and try again. Alternatively, you can search for a FACEIT player using the button below.

custom_teams.add_player_to_continue: Add atleast 1 player per team to continue.
custom_teams.title: Custom Teams

match_page.footer_weighted_average:
* Winrate is calculated using the weighted winrate of each player on a team.
Each player's influence on the winrate is weighted by played matches. Less played matches = less influence.
This should be the most accurate possible way of representing a team's winrate on a specific map.
